meanings.definition: A wild cat of Central and South America with a long body and tail, short legs, and a reddish-brown coat.
meanings.sent1: The jaguarundi moved gracefully through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a jaguarundi at the zoo last week.
meanings.sent3: The jaguarundi tried to wear a tiny hat but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: Her sleek movements were like a jaguarundi hunting its prey.
meanings.sent5: The reddish-brown coat of the jaguarundi shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: She admired the softness of the jaguarundi fur.
meanings.sent2: The jaguarundi fur was used to make a luxurious coat.
meanings.sent3: The jaguarundi fur was so fluffy that it made everyone want to cuddle it.
meanings.sent4: The jaguarundi fur felt like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The touch of jaguarundi fur was like touching a cloud.
